page.title: 03Old Dailly Cemetery-People
page.content: Old Dailly Cemetery is in a small hamlet and is surrounded by big old beech trees.It contains an old ruined church and the churchyard.Many old gravestones,some dating back to the{ {16th century}can be found and there are about 70 graves in all. Inside the church there are the graves of the{Dalrymple-Hamilton {family from Bargany. There is also a famous poet-artist buried in the cemetery,{William Bell {Scott of Penkill}is buried in a tomb. The oldest person to be buried there Georgina Cumming lived to be 95 years old and the youngest person is a five week old baby,the grave being marked by a small boulder. Near the church are the {"Charter {Stones",}two huge boulders used as a test of strength by local people.
